result.execSummary:
The defendant James R Larson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Must report to Probation today (9/29/16). Probation to apply any conditions it deem necessary and compliance.
Concurrent with: 15CM327

miscConds.notes: $265.60 fine/costs to be paid to the Clerk of Court Office within 60 days or set up payment plan. Failure to pay will be civil judgment. Bond to be applied to fine/costs and any overpayment on attorney fees to be applied.

Must provide DNA sample and pay the $200.00 DNA surcharge to the Clerk of Court Office within 60 days or set up payment plan. Failure to pay will be civil judgment. Bond to be applied to fine/costs and any overpayment on attorney fees to be applied.   Defendant may request expungement of the DNA sample under Wis. Stat. 165.77(4) by petitioning the Wisconsin Department of Justice. Expungement of DNA is NOT a court process. 
For information see: http://www.doj.state.wi.us/dles/crime-labs/clb-forms.
May not possess or use firearms.

timeConds.notes:
To be used by Probation Agent if necessary.
Concurrent with: 15CM327

Subject to Good Time.
Consecutive to: 15CM327 - Count 1
